name: latihan-express
description: **Please Ignore *node_modules/*** ## Create CRUD API ### Users API 1. Create GET **/users** endpoint, to get all user data in **users.json** 2. Create POST **/users** endpoint, to create new user, it takes this request body:   ```     {       "name":"Wuhan",       "email":"test01@mail.com",       "password":"qwerty",       "password_confirmation":"qwerty"     }   ``` 3. Password and its confirmation should have match.
